StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMasterPlanData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID integer, @SchoolYear integer, @UnitID integer = 0, @SchoolType varchar(2) = NULL, @Priority char(1) = NULL, @Status varchar(4) = NULL, @Access char(1) = NULL, @OrderBy varchar(50) = NULL AS
BEGIN DECLARE @SQLString NVARCHAR(1500) DECLARE @WhereClause NVARCHAR(1000)
SET @SQLString = 'SELECT SV.SCHOOL_CODE, SV.UNIT, SV.DODID, SV.SCHOOL_NAME +' + '''' + ' | ' + '''' + '+ SV.RECRUITER_LAST_NAME AS [SCHOOL_NAME], SV.CITY, SV.STATE, CASE WHEN SV.STATUS_CODE = ''NW/N'' THEN ''NC'' ELSE SV.STATUS_CODE END AS STATUS_CODE, SV.PRIORITY_CODE, SV.ACCESS_CODE, SV.MALE_SENIORS, SV.FEMALE_SENIORS, SV.PERCENT_TO_COLLEGE, SV.UNIT_ID, SV.DELETED, SV.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID ORGANIZATION_ID, SV.SCHOOL_TYPE, SV.SCHOOL_YEAR FROM SCHOOLVIEW SV ' SET @WhereClause = 'WHERE SV.DELETED = ''N'' AND SV.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = ' + CONVERT(varchar, @Organiza.onID) + ' AND SV.SCHOOL_YEAR = (SELECT MAX(SV2.SCHOOL_YEAR) FROM SCHOOLVIEW SV2 WHERE SV2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, @Organiza.onID) + ' AND SV2.SCHOOL_CODE = SV.SCHOOL_CODE AND SV2.SCHOOL_YEAR <= ' + CONVERT(varchar, @SchoolYear) + ')'
if @UnitID IS NOT NULL AND @UnitID != 0 SET @WhereClause = @WhereClause + ' AND UNIT_ID = ' + CONVERT(varchar, @UnitID)
if @SchoolType IS NOT NULL AND @SchoolType != '' SET @WhereClause = @WhereClause + ' AND SCHOOL_TYPE = ''' + @SchoolType + ''''
if @Priority IS NOT NULL AND @Priority != '' SET @WhereClause = @WhereClause + ' AND PRIORITY_CODE = ''' + @Priority + ''''
if @Status IS NOT NULL AND @Status != '' SET @WhereClause = @WhereClause + ' AND STATUS_CODE = ''' + @Status + ''''
if @Access IS NOT NULL AND @Access != '' SET @WhereClause = @WhereClause + ' AND ACCESS_CODE = ''' + @Access + ''''
if @OrderBy IS NOT NULL AND @OrderBy != '' SET @WhereClause = @WhereClause + ' ORDER BY '+@OrderBy
SET @SQLString = @SQLString + @WhereClause
EXEC sp_executesql @SQLString
END
